ULTIPEDIA 
 	ULTIPEDIA is a educational app that tries to make revision for Kenyan primary school students fun and interactive. You ,the player, is taken through a set of mutiple choice questions and by correctly answering them gain points towards being the Smartest and best prepared candidate.Ultipedia is not exclusively for Kenyan Primary school students but anyone can use it as measure to test their level of knowledge and understanding of simple concepts in various subject such as simple arithmetic and science. The game incoporates two modes: 
 
FUN MODE: 
 	This is where you are taken through sets of six questions each.Each question derived out of respective subjects.Each set of questions consitute a level The objective is to get to the most level by answering all the questions in the set correctly. 
 
 
School Mode: 
 
	This is where you choose a subject and then answer questions drawn from that specific subject a score is given after the questions are done. 
 
 
HAVE FUN!!

New Player
